item.title: CHPT
item.description: score:1084 Chances: The EV charging market is expected to reach $76.9 billion by 2027, creating growth opportunities for companies like ChargePoint. Global sales of electric vehicles (EVs) are expected to increase by 35% in 2023, driving demand for EV charging solutions. Demand for EVs and EV charging facilities is on the rise due to government support and climate change awareness.
